content: fire blossom 9-inch dishcloth materials 1 25 oz lily sugar n cream cotton yarn color red crochet hook size k yarn needle abbreviations chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch st = stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet round = round beg = beginning space = space fp = front post stitch from front of work make double_crochet around post of double_crochet in previous round increase = increase work 2 double_crochet in same st instructions note do not turn work at end of rnds chain 5 join with slip_stitch to form ring round 1 chain 3 15 double_crochet in ring for this round and all following rnds join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 16 dcs round 2 chain 3 double_crochet in same space fp * 2 double_crochet in next st fp repeat from * around 8 fps round 3 chain 3 double_crochet in same space increase fp * increase in each of next 2 sts fp repeat from * around round 4 chain 3 double_crochet in same space 2 double_crochet increase fp * increase 2 double_crochet increase fp repeat from * around round 5 chain 3 double_crochet in same space 4 double_crochet increase fp * increase 4 double_crochet increase fp repeat from * around round 6 chain 3 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet fp * 2 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet increase 2 double_crochet fp repeat from * around shell edging chain 1 single_crochet in same space * skip 2 sts 7-double_crochet shell in next st skip 2 sts single_crochet in next st repeat from * around working last repeat as skip 1 st 7-double_crochet shell in next st skip 2 sts slip_stitch in beg single_crochet fasten yarn weave in ends © 2006 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this pattern by any means you may sell your finished work made from this pattern
